name: cerb.ticket.participants.remove
script:
inputs:
  record/ticket:
    record_type: ticket
    required@bool: yes
  records/participants:
    record_type: address
    required@bool: yes

# [TODO] Check permissions on worker
start:
  record.update:
    output: record_result
    inputs:
      record_type: ticket
      record_id: {{inputs.ticket.id}}
      fields:
        participant_ids: -{{array_column(inputs.participants,'id')|join(',-')}}
    on_success:
      return:
        success: true
    on_error:
      error:
        message: {{record_result.error}}
